title: Replace print() statements with logging module
description: Migrate all print() calls to Python logging module per CLAUDE.md standards. Add proper log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR) and configure from environment variables.

title: Document logging configuration
description: Add docstrings for logging setup. Update README with LOG_LEVEL environment variable usage. Update .env.example.

title: Add pylint and mypy configuration files
description: Create .pylintrc and mypy.ini with appropriate settings. Configure for Python project standards.

title: Ensure tests pass pylint/mypy checks
description: Test code must follow same quality standards. Add type hints to test functions and fixtures.

title: Achieve 80%+ test coverage
description: Run pytest with coverage plugin. Ensure all critical paths are tested. Generate coverage report with pytest-cov.

title: Implement result caching system
description: Cache analysis results using file hashes (SHA-256) to avoid re-analyzing unchanged files. Store in ~/.cache/codeaudit/ directory.

title: Run pylint/mypy on logging changes
description: Ensure logging implementation passes pylint (score >= 10.0) and mypy type checking. Add type hints for logger instances.

title: Fix all pylint and mypy issues in codeaudit.py
description: Run pylint and mypy on codeaudit.py. Fix all errors and warnings. Achieve pylint score >= 10.0 and zero mypy errors.

title: Implement pytest test suite with mocked Gemini API
description: Create tests/ directory with test_codeanalyzer.py, test_file_scanning.py, and conftest.py. Mock all Gemini API calls. Test edge cases and error conditions.

title: Add comprehensive unit tests with pytest
description: Create full test suite for CodeAnalyzer class with mocked Gemini API calls. Aim for 80%+ code coverage. Critical gap in current codebase.

title: Write tests for logging functionality
description: Create unit tests that verify log messages are emitted at correct levels. Test log configuration from environment variables.

title: Add pylint and mypy code quality checks
description: Configure and run pylint and mypy per CLAUDE.md standards. Add configuration files and fix all issues.

title: Document testing setup and procedures
description: Add Testing section to README. Document how to run tests, check coverage, and write new tests. Add pytest.ini configuration.

title: Add requirements-dev.txt with linting tools
description: Create requirements-dev.txt with pylint, mypy, pytest, pytest-cov, black, isort. Document dev setup in README.

title: Implement logging configuration and replace print statements
description: Add logging module imports, configure logger with levels from env vars, replace all print() calls with appropriate log levels. Ensure no sensitive data in logs.
